# GitHub Notification Manager - Technical Architecture

**Generated by System Architect Agent**

## Tech Stack (7-10 Day MVP)

### Core Technologies
- **Chrome Extension:** Manifest V3
- **Frontend:** React 18 + TypeScript
- **Build Tool:** Vite + CRXJS Vite Plugin
- **UI Library:** Tailwind CSS + Headless UI
- **State Management:** Zustand (1KB, simple)
- **GitHub API:** Octokit.js
- **Testing:** Vitest + Testing Library

### Storage Strategy
- **chrome.storage.local** (no backend needed for MVP)
- **Operating Cost:** $0/month for MVP


## Implementation Roadmap

**Day 1-2:** Foundation (OAuth + GitHub API)
**Day 3-4:** UI Components + Badge
**Day 5-6:** Filtering + Snooze
**Day 7-8:** Polish + Auto-Archive
**Day 9-10:** Testing + Chrome Web Store Submission

**Full details in sprint plan.**

## Cost Analysis

- **MVP (0-100 users):** $0/month
- **Growth (100-500 users):** $14/month (API + analytics)
- **Scale (500-1000 users):** $14/month

**Break-even:** 4 paid users ($20 revenue > $14 costs)
